Contributor: Cudlipp, Thelma, artist.; Medical Women's National Association (U.S.), publisher.;
Note: Design by "Thelma Cudlipp." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text asks for people to contribute up to $200,000 for the American Women's Hospitals in Europe. Illustration shows a women doctor in a uniform comforting a family.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : Medical Women's National Association,

Title: Thirty-five of our women doctors are already over there
